about_the_game:
Decks of the Damned is a strategic roguelike auto-battler in a card-based simulation format.
Embark on a journey to shroud the land in darkness and seize it under your control.

COMMAND YOUR MINIONS WITH SEVERAL CLASSES OF VAMPIRES

Tamer: With their ability to command monsters and beasts.
Shaman: Skilled practitioners of dark magic, possessing the ability to heal their allies and strengthen their powers.
Enchanter: Their mastery extends beyond traditional blacksmithing, as they possess the skill to harness the forces of magic and channel them into the metal creations.

EXPLORE A RANDOMLY GENERATED WORLD IN CONQUEST MODE

Locate and raid hidden human villages and kingdoms as you progress through this game mode. Each area presents unique sets of resources, creatures and human resistance, so plan your journey carefully.

EQUIPMENT ENHANCES THE STATS OF YOUR MINIONS

Apart from base stats such as attack speed, armor, evasion, and critical chance, discover a wide range of equipment infused with magical properties. Stun, poison, bleed, burn, double strike, and regeneration are just a few of the many effects you will come across.

THE TRAVELING MERCHANT GOT YOU COVERED

This dubious merchant roams the lands and drops in at times to offer a wide range of goods.

short_description: Raise an undead army by night, while by day, fend off human attacks on your lair. Enhance your minions by crafting and looting gear. Discover powerful crafting recipes. Explore lost ruins in quest for rare artifacts. Raid human villages. Shroud the land in darkness under your control.
